name: Street Atlas USA Draw File
summary: Learn about .AN1 files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Here are several prominent categories of layers that may be saved in an AN1 file:
Draw Layers - May contain arcs, splines, circles, polygons, symbols, and text labels
Waypoint Layers - Stores waypoints, which are points of references for navigation purposes
Road Layers, Waypoint Layers, and Track Layers become part of the searchable database when added.
NOTE: DeLorme discontinued Street Atlas USA.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
